verses.verse: And the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> to me, saying,<WH559>
Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> set<WH7760> your face<WH6440> toward<WH413> the mountains<WH2022> of Israel,<WH3478> and prophesy<WH5012> against<WH413> them,

And say,<WH559> You mountains<WH2022> of Israel,<WH3478> hear<WH8085> the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069> to the mountains,<WH2022> and to the hills,<WH1389> to the rivers,<WH650> and to the valleys;<WH1516> Behold,<WH2005> I, even I, will bring<WH935> a sword<WH2719> on you, and I will destroy<WH6> your high<WH1116> places.
And your altars<WH4196> shall be desolate,<WH8074> and your images<WH2553> shall be broken:<WH7665> and I will cast<WH5307> down<WH5307> your slain<WH2491> men before<WH6440> your idols.<WH1544>

And I will lay<WH5414> the dead carcasses<WH6297> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> before<WH6440> their idols;<WH1544> and I will scatter<WH2219> your bones<WH6106> round<WH5439> about your altars.<WH4196>

In all<WH3605> your dwelling places<WH4186> the cities<WH5892> shall be laid waste,<WH2717> and the high<WH1116> places shall be desolate;<WH3456> that your altars<WH4196> may be laid waste<WH2717> and made desolate,<WH816> and your idols<WH1544> may be broken<WH7665> and cease,<WH7673> and your images<WH2553> may be cut<WH1438> down,<WH1438> and your works<WH4639> may be abolished.<WH4229>
And the slain<WH2491> shall fall<WH5307> in the middle<WH8432> of you, and you shall know<WH3045> that I am the LORD.<WH3068>

Yet will I leave<WH3498> a remnant,<WH3498> that you may have<WH1961> some that shall escape<WH6412> the sword<WH2719> among the nations,<WH1471> when you shall be scattered<WH2219> through the countries.<WH776>

And they that escape<WH6412> of you shall remember<WH2142> me among the nations<WH1471> where<WH834> <WH8033> they shall be carried<WH7617> captives,<WH7617> because<WH834> I am broken<WH7665> with their whorish<WH2181> heart,<WH3820> which<WH834> has departed<WH5493> from me, and with their eyes,<WH5869> which go<WH3318> a whoring<WH2181> after<WH310> their idols:<WH1544> and they shall loathe<WH6962> themselves<WH6440> for the evils<WH7451> which<WH834> they have committed<WH6213> in all<WH3605> their abominations.<WH8441>
And they shall know<WH3045> that I am the LORD,<WH3068> and that I have not said<WH1696> in vain<WH2600> that I would do<WH6213> this<WH2063> evil<WH7451> to them.

Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> Smite<WH5221> with your hand,<WH3709> and stamp<WH7554> with your foot,<WH7272> and say,<WH559> Alas<WH253> for all<WH3605> the evil<WH7451> abominations<WH8441> of the house<WH1004> of Israel!<WH3478> for they shall fall<WH5307> by the sword,<WH2719> by the famine,<WH7458> and by the pestilence.<WH1698>

He that is far<WH7350> off shall die<WH4191> of the pestilence;<WH1698> and he that is near<WH7138> shall fall<WH5307> by the sword;<WH2719> and he that remains<WH7604> and is besieged<WH5341> shall die<WH4191> by the famine:<WH7458> thus will I accomplish<WH3615> my fury<WH2534> on them.

Then shall you know<WH3045> that I am the LORD,<WH3068> when their slain<WH2491> men shall be among<WH8432> their idols<WH1544> round<WH5439> about their altars,<WH4196> on every<WH3605> high<WH7311> hill,<WH1389> in all<WH3605> the tops<WH7218> of the mountains,<WH2022> and under<WH8478> every<WH3605> green<WH7488> tree,<WH6086> and under<WH8478> every<WH3605> thick<WH5687> oak,<WH424> the place<WH4725> where<WH834> <WH8033> they did offer<WH5414> sweet<WH5207> smell<WH7381> to all<WH3605> their idols.<WH1544>

So will I stretch<WH5186> out my hand<WH3027> on them, and make<WH5414> the land<WH776> desolate,<WH8077> yes, more desolate<WH8047> than the wilderness<WH4057> toward Diblath,<WH1689> in all<WH3605> their habitations:<WH4186> and they shall know<WH3045> that I am the LORD.<WH3068>
